comments.comment: Hamuduruwane me ape rata obe rata mage rata me ashirwadalath mihikatha rakaganna oni.apita j.v.p. Kalabalakale lokuwata danune naha.awurudu ganaka ilama koti samaga loku yudfayak thibina eth ekath echcharama fanume naha. Meka karanne kolapata desapaluwo .tika.ranil.mihikatha namathi apu muthu kateta atha thibbe.unage daruwonta kanna denna nam eka dukak naha. Ape sundara hambayonta pawa dunna.ranilta ape ratata hena gahuwath kamak naha ekata oni.thawath kolahala athi karala amarican hamudawa gennanna.kalakanni thopi atha thiyanne hoda dewal walata newei. Mage nam adahasa hamuduruwanu owunge anukampawa apita epa hamudawa polisiya okkoma janathawage paththe inna oya desapaluwo thani karanna. Niluth epa apita kolath epa.ranilwI rajithawai ballowage panna danna oni.okunta pirith nool badinna epa kisima hamuduru kenek.nambunama deela katha karanna epa owunta okun mankolla karayo.mona sakkiliya unath kamak naha owunta salli denawanam uta rata wikunanawa.maithree palata thama api cha de dunne.ranilta chande dunne naha.ape rata adawala iwarai danwath oya kalakanni wada nawaththapalla.nathnam parliment ekath ekka thopi okkoma polawa palagena nirayatama yanawa ekanthai.
comments.author: Judy Kulathunga
